snippet: With Tom Brady set to become the second quarterback to start five Super Bowls, The Fifth Down is comparing his body of work with top performers in the game that decides it all. In the final installment: Joe Montana.
abstract: With Tom Brady set to become the second quarterback to start five Super Bowls, The Fifth Down is comparing his body of work with top performers in the game that decides it all. In the final installment: Joe Montana.
lead_paragraph: With Tom Brady set to become the second quarterback to start five Super Bowls, The Fifth Down is comparing his body of work to some of the sport's greatest performers in the game that decides it all.

headline.main: The QB Files: Tom Brady vs. Joe Montana
